question: Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has launched ‘Cybersecurity vision framework’ for which banks?
explanation:
The Reserve Bank of India has recently published the ‘Technology Vision for Cyber Security for Urban Co-operative Banks (UCBs) - 2020-2023’.
The document aims to achieve the objective of enhancing the cyber security of the UCBs through a five-pillared strategic approach GUARD. The document also has 12 specific points for the framework.
